mapper.sql: i.id, i.name, i.sex, i.cardID, i.createBy, i.createTime, i.updateBy, i.updateTime, i.version, i.isDeleted

where 1=1 and i.id = #{condition.id} and i.name = #{condition.name} and i.sex = #{condition.sex} and i.cardID = #{condition.cardID} and i.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and i.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and i.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and i.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and i.version = #{condition.version} and i.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted}

where 1=1 and i.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(i.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.name}),'%')) and UPPER(i.sex) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.sex}),'%')) and UPPER(i.cardID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.cardID}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(i.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%'))
mapper.update: update insperson set name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, cardID=#{cardID}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from insperson i where i.id = #{id} and i.isDeleted = false

SELECT * FROM (SELECT i.name AS 'name', i.cardID AS 'cardID', 2 AS 'type', i.id AS 'id', i.createTime AS 'createTime' FROM insperson i WHERE i.id IN (SELECT insrecordperson.`personID` FROM insrecordperson WHERE insrecordperson.`recordID` IN (SELECT insrecord.id FROM insrecord WHERE insrecord.`createBy` = #{condition.userID})) OR i.createBy = #{condition.userID} UNION ALL SELECT personalauthen.`realName` AS 'name', personalauthen.`personIDCard` AS 'cardID', 1 AS 'type', id AS 'id', personalauthen.createTime AS 'createTime' FROM personalauthen WHERE personalauthen.`userID` IN (SELECT b.`createBy` FROM beenrecruited b WHERE positionID IN (SELECT p.`ID` FROM POSITION p WHERE p.`userID` = #{condition.userID})) ) temp WHERE UPPER(temp.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.name}),'%')) OR UPPER(temp.cardID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.name}),'%')) GROUP BY temp.cardID, temp.name ORDER BY temp.createTime DESC

SELECT insperson.`name`, insperson.`cardID`, insprofessiontype.`name` AS 'professor', insrecord.`enterpriseName` AS 'enterprise', DATE_FORMAT(insrecord.`date`,'%Y-%m') AS 'date', CONCAT(IF(insfee.`insuredAmount`=80,'80','30'), "万元保额") AS 'type', IF(insperson.`sex`=1,'男','女') AS 'sex' FROM insRecord LEFT JOIN insrecordperson insrecordperson ON insrecordperson.`recordID` = insrecord.`id` LEFT JOIN insPerson insperson ON insperson.`id` = insrecordperson.`personID` LEFT JOIN insprofessiontype insprofessiontype ON insprofessiontype.`id` = insrecordperson.`professionID` LEFT JOIN insfee insfee ON insfee.`id` = insrecord.`feeID` WHERE insRecord.`status` = 1 AND insrecord.`id` = #{recordID}
